title: The Life Time Grand Prix Series Will Be Back in 2025 With New Races and Fewer Riders
content:
One new gravel race and one new mountain bike race join Unbound, Leadville, and others for the fourth edition of the series.

Read the full article at The Life Time Grand Prix Series Will Be Back in 2025 With New Races and Fewer Riders on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
